comment.author: 38108133@N02
comment._content: This is now an Embassy Suites Hotel

comment.author: 62622887@N02
comment._content: Previous commenter is not correct, having probably mistaken this building for the Multnomah Hotel, now an Embassy Suites, built in 1912.  The Beck Building, hugely and unfortunately remodeled, is at 225 SW Broadway, and is now known as the Commerce Building.

comment._content: Found this link to the remodeled building, quite a difference. www.rofo.com/content/buildings/140994/standard_e2e64d67d1...
